entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and 70 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming east 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023
